_header: This ender day when me was woe
_description: Fragment of a carol, probably on an amorous theme — one 3-line stanza and burden: ‘I have loued so many a day / Ligthly spedde bot better I may’

BLAdd5666.Transcription:
This ender day wen me was woNaghtgale to meue me toVnder a bugh
                    ther I lay
BLAdd5666.Note:
The manuscript is in the handwriting of Friar
                            John Brackley (f. 1v).
